00:00 New "Miami Vice" Film From "Top Gun: Maverick" Director in Development
A new movie from the world of "Miami Vice" is currently in development. According to industry portal The Hollywood Reporter, "Top Gun: Maverick" director Joseph Kosinski will be responsible for the project.

01:52 Split Fiction: Sydney Sweeney Takes On Lead Role in Live-Action Film Adaptation
The hype surrounding video game adaptations continues unabated. According to Variety, a live-action film adaptation of the hugely successful game "Split Fiction" is now in the pipeline. In the leading role: Sydney Sweeney.
